origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_policy_impact', 'description': 'This function evaluates the impact of a specific financial policy on a given industry over a defined period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial policy, e.g., financial_support, tax_reform.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry affected by the policy, e.g., logistics, manufacturing.'}, {'name': 'coveragePeriod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period over which the policy impact is evaluated, in YYYY format.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impactAnalysis', 'description': 'A detailed report on how the policy has affected the industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_policy_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'financial_support', 'industry'是'logistics', 'coveragePeriod'是'2022-2023'.
